Title: The Curtain Pole
Writer: G.W. Bitzer, D.W. Griffith, Mack Sennett
Actors: Mack Sennett, Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence
Plot: An upper class drawing room. A gentleman breaks the curtain pole and goes in search of a replacement, but he stops into a pub first. He buys a very long pole, and causes havoc everywhere he passes, accumulating an ever-growing entourage chasing him, until he escapes them through a bit of movie magic, only to discover that the pole has already been replaced.
